articles.title: Tuttosport: "Kirovski, the director of Milan Futuro, will renew his contract"
articles.summary: The edition of Tuttosport on newsstands this morning has the headline: "Kirovski, the director of Milan Futuro, will renew his contract".

articles.title: Milan, Gabbia could at most recover on the bench
articles.summary: Matteo Gabbia, who suffered a strain on his flexor during the pre-Milan-Parma warm-up on Sunday, also worked separately yesterday.

articles.title: Towards Cremonese-Milan: will it be the right time to see Fullkrug from the first minute?
articles.summary: In the last match against Parma, Max Allegri deployed the attacking duo of Christian Pulisic and Rafael Leao, but they did not convince and for this reason they may not be confirmed on Sunday against Cremonese.

articles.title: Milan, the watchword is to avoid psychological repercussions after the defeat against Parma
articles.summary: As today's edition of the Gazzetta dello Sport writes this morning, the watchword at the Rossoneri at the moment is to avoid psychological repercussions after the defeat against Parma.

articles.title: Milan-Terracciano, forward together: renewal until 2027 ready for the goalkeeper
articles.summary: Having arrived at Milanello last summer after signing an annual contract, Pietro Terracciano is ready to extend his relationship with Milan until 30 June 2027.

articles.title: Towards Cremonese-Milan: Modric and Rabiot do not touch each other, Jashari ahead of Ricci and Fofana
articles.summary: Milan continues its work at Milanello in view of Sunday's match at 12.30 against Cremonese and today Max Allegri will begin to tactically prepare for the match at the Grigiorossi's home ground.

articles.title: Milan is pressing on Modric: everyone wants his renewal. Positive feelings
articles.summary: After Mike Maignan, captain and leader of Milan, the club from via Aldo Rossi is now working to renew other players, including for example Luka Modric, a true beacon on and off the pitch for the Rossoneri team.

articles.title: Inter eliminated from the Champions League, how the possible date of the Derby changes
articles.summary: On Tuesday evening, Inter sensationally exited the Champions League against Bodo/Glimt who, with a double victory between the home and away legs, eliminated the Nerazzurri.

articles.title: Milan Primavera, next match and updated standings
articles.summary: On Sunday 1 March, at 11am, Milan Primavera faces Roma at the Tre Fontane stadium in a match valid for the 27th matchday of the Primavera 1 championship. Renna's Rossoneri are coming off a great 2-1 victory against Napoli.

articles.title: Milan-Turin, ticket sales continue: the free phase has begun
articles.summary: Ticket sales for the AC Milan-Turin match have been open for a few days now, scheduled for the weekend of 21-22 March with a date to be defined.

articles.title: Milan Futuro, date and time of the next championship match
articles.summary: After the excellent away win against Caldiero Terme, a clear and convincing 3-0, Mr. Oddo's Milan Futuro will face Folgore Caratese first in the standings. The appointment is for Sunday 1 March 2026 at 2pm.

articles.title: Serie A, matchday 27: dates and times of all the weekend's matches

articles.title: Juventus, Comolli: "Elkann was clear, he will never sell the club"
articles.summary: (ANSA) - TURIN, FEBRUARY 26 - "Elkann was very clear: he said he would never sell the club": this is how the CEO of Juventus, Damien Comolli, spoke about the future of the club.
